data.title: Jordi Pujol Soler & Rolando Montes de Oca
data.text:
Jordi Pujol Soler, born in Barcelona, Spain, (1975) is Professor of Ethics and Communication Law at the Faculty of Institutional Social Communication of the Pontifical University of the Holy Cross in Rome.

Rolando Montes de Oca, born in Camag√ºey, Cuba (1981), graduated in Institutional Social Communication at the Pontifical University of the Holy Cross in 2019. Regular Collaborator with secular and Church publications in Cuba.
